blur_detection.description: The receipt shows clear, well-defined text with good sharpness and minimal blur.
blur_detection.recommendation: No action needed as text clarity is sufficient for OCR processing.

contrast_assessment.description: The receipt exhibits excellent black text contrast against the white background.
contrast_assessment.recommendation: No contrast enhancement needed for this receipt.

glare_identification.description: Minimal glare is present and does not interfere with text readability.
glare_identification.recommendation: No action needed regarding glare issues.

water_stains.description: No water stains or related damage are visible on the receipt.
water_stains.recommendation: No remediation needed for water damage.

tears_or_folds.description: The receipt appears flat with no visible tears, creases or significant folds.
tears_or_folds.recommendation: No action needed regarding physical damage.

cut_off_detection.description: All edges of the receipt are visible with no cut-off content.
cut_off_detection.recommendation: No need to recapture the receipt as all content is visible.

missing_sections.description: The receipt appears complete with header, line items, subtotal, service charge and total.
missing_sections.recommendation: No need to check for missing content as the receipt structure is intact.

obstructions.description: A small red object is visible at the top edge of the image but does not obstruct any receipt content.
obstructions.recommendation: No action needed as the minor obstruction doesn't affect content readability.
